title: American Horror Story 8: Apocalypse // Promo: Piece of paper
author: American Horror Story 10
comment: SERIOUSLY, the best teaser yet!  First one was sick, but this one is beyond sick
Binge watching Murder house and  coven ! I literally just seen finished the episode where Billie dean says this
As much as i love ahs, this should be the last season as it will be hard to make the next season better or more epic than the Apocalypse. Also this season will tie in all the open endings
AHHHH I CANT WAIT IM SO EXCITED IVE BEEN WAITING FOR SO LONG
I need to get my wig in a safe bunker asap
